org.springframework.data.repository.reactive

接口 RxJava2SortingRepository<T,ID>

  • 所有超级接口:
    Repository<T,ID>, RxJava2CrudRepository<T,ID>

    @NoRepositoryBean
public interface RxJava2SortingRepository<T,ID>
extends RxJava2CrudRepository<T,ID>
    Extension of RxJava2CrudRepository to provide additional methods to retrieve entities using the sorting abstraction.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    另请参阅:
    Sort, Flowable, RxJava2CrudRepository

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <any> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Returns all entities sorted by the given options.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.RxJava2CrudRepository

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findAllById, findById, findById, save, saveAll, saveAll

    • 方法详细资料

      • findAll

        <any> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
        Returns all entities sorted by the given options.
        参数:
        sort - must not be null.
        返回:
        all entities sorted by the given options.
